thread.title: Justin Bieber names new album Purpose with cryptic Insta pic
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber names new album Purpose with cryptic Insta pic

title: Justin Bieber names new album Purpose with cryptic Insta pic
text:
Justin Bieber names new album 'Purpose' with cryptic Insta pic 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Saturday 3rd October, 2015 
Justin Bieber has finally revealed the name of his most awaited album 'Purpose' with a cryptic image posted on social media. 
According to the Hollywood Reporter, the 21-year-old singer took to Instagram to announce the name of his new album and posted the cryptic pic with the title 'Purpose' and the hashtag 6weeks. 
Earlier, the 'Baby' hit-maker teased his fans by posting black and white snapshots all bearing the inscription, "Purpose sixweeks." 
It is said that the title six weeks refers to the album's release date. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News MJs     Olivia
